name: Tiny Champ Space Factory - Future Hero Kid
name_original: Tiny Champ Space Factory - Future Hero Kid
description: Tired of being just a Test Dummy in a robot factory you decide to defeat the robot war and be free! Try to escape the robot battle wrath with cool weapons to choose from. Fast paced nutty action will keep you on your toes in this cool robot fighting game. Good for all ages, boys and girls. Mega Man meets robot cop. Cute tiny robots to unlock and play.
